title: [Large-scale] Project-based Learning Design Utilizing Blended STEM Education Delivery Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science and engineering concepts, experience using fundamental laboratory tools
context.additional_context: Applying blended learning methods combining online and face-to-face instruction in environments where digital devices are provided. Supporting learner growth through periodic feedback focused on formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can perform online-face-to-face learning activities with over 80% participation rate following an 8-stage instructional design flow in STEM problem-solving processes
Learners can submit project outcomes analyzing and solving complex engineering problems with scaffolding support at least three times
Learners can complete self-reflection reports based on peer feedback and instructor evaluation in blended learning environments with over 90% completion rate
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
